ocean.question: I have many arms, but cannot hug. I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am a sea creature
🖌️ I can squirt ink
🖐️ I have eight of something

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and fish swim through. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth
🚢 Boats sail on me
🏖️ I have waves that crash on the shore

ocean.question: I have a shell and live in the sea. If you hold me to your ear, you might hear the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I move very slowly
🐚 I can be found on the beach
🏡 My house is on my back

ocean.question: I'm a giant mammal that sings in the sea. People go out on boats just to see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am the largest animal on Earth
🌊 I spout water from a hole on my head
🎶 I communicate with others like me using songs

ocean.question: I am a fish, but I have a sword on my nose. What am I?

hints.text: ⚔️ I use my nose to hunt
🐟 I am a popular sport fish
🌊 I am a predator in the ocean

ocean.question: I’m a colorful reef dweller with venomous spines. Watch out when you swim or you might need some time. What am I?

hints.text: 🐡 I am a type of fish.
🌈 I can be found in many different colors.
☠️ My spines can be very painful.

ocean.question: I'm a sea creature that looks like a plant, but I'm actually an animal with stinging tentacles. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I can be colorful like a flower
🐙 I live attached to rocks
🤕 I can sting if you touch me

ocean.question: I am a large sea turtle known for traveling very far. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am the biggest of my kind.
🧳 I migrate long distances.
🍴 My favorite food are jellyfish.

ocean.question: I am a place in the ocean that is very deep and dark, deeper than any mountain is tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 No sunlight reaches me
🏔️ I am the lowest point on Earth
🌊 I am a trench

ocean.question: I am a type of current caused by differences in water density due to temperature and salinity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I involve heat.
🧂 I involve salt.
🔄 I am a global circulation pattern.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. I often travel on a schedule. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride me at once.
📍 I have specific stops where people get on and off.
🚌 I'm bigger than a car, but smaller than a train.

transport.question: I fly through the air, but I'm not a bird or a superhero. I take people to far away places quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 💺 I have many seats and travel long distances.
☁️ You can see me high up in the clouds.
✈️ I have wings but do not flap them.

transport.question: I travel on water, but I'm not a fish. I can be big or small, and carry people or cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float.
⚓ I might need an anchor.
🚢 I can cross oceans.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, and I can be very long. I carry many people or goods from one place to another. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a specific path.
📢 You might hear a whistle.
🚂 I am made of many cars hooked together.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. I'm good exercise and don't use any fuel. What am I?

hints.text: 👟 You need to pedal.
⛰️ You can ride me on roads or trails.
🚲 I sometimes have gears to help you go faster.

transport.question: I travel underground, carrying many people quickly through the city. I have many stations. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You need to go down stairs or an elevator to reach me.
🏙️ I'm common in large cities.
🚦I avoid traffic.

transport.question: I am a fast way to travel on water, but I don't have sails. I often carry tourists or commuters. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I'm faster than many other boats.
🛥️ I often have a powerful engine.
⚓ I usually make regular trips between two points.

transport.question: I'm like a car, but I'm usually bigger and used for carrying goods, not people. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I transport things.
🚚 I might have a trailer attached.
🛣️ I travel long distances on highways.

transport.question: I can travel over land and water, but I'm neither a car nor a boat. I'm often used in swamps and marshes. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I use a large fan to move.
🐊 You might see me in the Everglades.
🌿 I can travel in very shallow water.

transport.question: I travel through space, much faster than any airplane, and carry astronauts. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I use powerful rockets to escape Earth's gravity.
👨‍🚀 People live inside me for extended periods.
✨ I can orbit the Earth or travel to other planets.
